title: The fame and confession of the fraternity of R: C: Commonly, of the Rosie Cross. With a præface annexed thereto, and a short declaration of their physicall work. By Eugenius Philalethes.
author: Vaughan, Thomas, 1622-1666.
publisher: Printed by J.M. for Giles Calvert, at the black spread Eagle at the West end of Pauls,
notes: A translation with original preface, by Thomas Vaughan (i.e. Eugenius Philalethes), of: Fama Fraternitatis, oder, Entdeckung der Brüdershafft des löblichen Ordens des RosenCreutzes, attributed to Johann Valentin Andreä.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
